text: Pucajasa (possibly from Quechua puka red, q'asa mountain pass, "red pass") is a mountain in the Vilcanota mountain range in the Andes of Peru. It is situated in the Cusco Region, Canchis Province, Pitumarca District. Pucajasa lies west of Cóndor Tuco. The Killitamayu flows along its slope.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Quispicanchis Province 1 (Cusco Region) ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Cusco Region
title: Pucajasa (Canchis)
